EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation for a session with Mr. Ron Kaufman
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name}, On behalf of Ffreedom Financial Planners & in association with Gautam Ganglani of Right Selection Group & Vikas Vij of The Ideas Exchange I would like to take this opportunity to invite you for an exclusive workshop conducted personally by Mr. Ron Kaufman, the world’s leading educator of Uplifting Customer Service Culture & author of the book uplifting service. We at Ffreedom strongly believe in the concept of Customer Service Culture & hence bring to you a half day workshop scheduled for Friday, February 18th which will focus on  “Service Leadership”, the workshop is directed towards CEO’s, Directors & Senior Management decision makers showing them how you can continue to spread the ‘uplifting service culture’ in their organizations. To give you an idea on what to expect here is a short high impact & powerful video just released by Ron Kaufman.  Here it is for you http://www.ronkaufman.com/speaking/keynote-overview I am personally going to be attending this workshop & I had you in mind and believe you would appreciate this opportunity, to come along as our VIP guests. Therefore kindly confirm to me if you will join me at the workshop that I am sincerely recommending. I will be happy to register your name in the VIP Guest list.   Also here are the video links with a personal message from Ron for all of us on the events: The Service Leadership Workshop (Morning 9.00 am – 12.30 pm on Feb 18th): http://tinyurl.com/video-msg-from-RON-for-SLW
Looking forward to seeing you at the event, Regards Sumeet Vaid Founder & CEO – Ffreedom Financial Planners
